item.title: How We Reported on Rhetoric About Immigrants in the 2024 Election
item.description: The Marshall Project identified themes in over 12,000 immigration-related campaign statements and fact-checked 13 of Trump’s most repeated claims.

item.title: In this election, demographics did not determine how people voted
item.description: Groups that Democrats believed would always turn out in their favor did not do so this year. Here's how the vote shook out in the seven swing states.

item.title: Dry Elbows or Something Else?
